programme.title: German Touring Championship 1995
programme.desc: Exciting, brutal and thrilling. The 1995 German Touring Car Championships. And with powerful races - also successful on the international stage. Mercedes driver Bernd Schneider dominated and won the title.

programme.title: Jim Clark - The Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: Flying Scotsman.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic
programme.desc: The Le Mans Classic is a vintage sports car event that took place for the first time in 2002 on the site of the 24-hour race of Le Mans. All participating drivers are at a top level as far as driving is concerned.

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: The Mercedes 300SL might be the most exciting sports car of the post-war era. A panel of judges even named it the sports car of the century. Hans Kleissl from Polling near Munich owns one of the world's leading repair and restoration shops for SL models. Classic Ride accompanies him and his 300SL, originally owned by playboy Porfiro Rubirosa, to the Classic Days at Schloss Dyck.

programme.title: Chateau Impney Hill Climb
programme.desc: Motorsports has been taken place at the Château Impney near Droitwich Spa in Worcestershire, England since the 1950s. But no event was as big and successful as the Chateau Impney Hill Climb. Every year, the event attracts a wide array of vintage cars and more modern supercars. However, 2019 sees the last edition of the iconic Chateau Impney Hill Climb.

programme.title: Manthey Racing
programme.desc: Racing in the Green Hell.

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.

programme.title: DTM
programme.desc: The DTM - Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters - is the premier German touring car championship. In 2022, the competition is in its 23rd season and features 16 races across 8 weekends. Motorvision.TV shows the best bits from each event.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The IMSA WeatherTech SportsCar Championhip is an endurance racing championship in North America where up to five different classes compete in eleven events.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge Europe
programme.desc: The Ferrari Challenge is a single-marque motorsport championship that was created in 1993 and is now the longest-running single-make series championship. The European series is a two-class championship and by far the largest series. It contains 7 races, held on challenging and most prestigious European circuits.

programme.title: GT World Challenge Asia
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: GT World Challenge America
programme.desc: It's America's most challenging and scenic circuits. GT World Challenge America offers exclusive GT3 racing in an exciting way with the two-driver, 90-minute SprintX style format with full-service pit stops that provide great racing and high competition. Each event features two races per weekend in a friendly atmosphere. Many manufacturers including Acura, BMW, Bentley, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Mercedes-AMG, Nissan, and Porsche campaign entries in the category.

programme.title: Autodromo Nazionale
programme.desc: See all the action and best parts from the GT World Challenge Europe, a sports car racing series divided into two separate championships - the GT World Challenge Europe Sprint Cup, and the GT World Challenge Europe Endurance Cup.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.desc: When their ambitions exceed their driving skills, when well-secured racing professionals are thrown out of corners, we always have a camera at hand. Breathtaking stunts by professional drivers and slapstick-action in highly-tuned tin can rockets. Spectacular scenes where nobody gets hurt.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Car Action Highlights) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Car Action Highlights»Ther are million ways to destroy a car: Crashes, flips and jumps. We show the highlights of this seasons car stunts.

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: A Ferrari is tight, impractical and can only be used in the sunshine on dry roads. These times are now finally over. The Ferrari FF, the first family-friendly GT sports car - with 4-wheel drive, V12 engine and 660 hp.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Autódromo Internacional do Algarve, Portugal
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: Championnat de Belgique des Rallyes
programme.desc: BRC.

programme.title: Azores Rallye, Portugal
programme.desc: Amazing challenge around Europe includes 19 special stages. The top crew will become Tour European Rally champion in one of the most beautiful European rallies.

programme.title: Tour European Rally Historic
programme.desc: Motorvision TV brings you all the action from the independent rally series taking place around Europe.

programme.title: Middle East Bajas World Cup
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Rallye-raid : Tunisia Desert Challenge
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: BTRDA Rallycross Championship
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Rali Vinho da Madeira
programme.desc: Founded in 1959, the Rali Vinho da Madeira is one of the biggest annual sporting events on the Portuguese Island of Madeira. In 2020, the rally consists of seven sections across the island and attracts thousands of people each year to enjoy the beautiful landscapes and to watch the participants competing on hilly terrain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Gravel Pit) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Gravel Pit»Heavy equipment comes into use - as a car has to crash at full speed into a pile of gravel...

programme.title: Supercars S4
programme.desc: If you started a family and had to say goodbye to your beloved sports car, there's no reason to cry, because you can still get a bit of a racing feeling with a station wagon. The E 63 S AMG T with its 585 HP V8 biturbo engine is as fast as a sports car and can take your family wherever they want. Plus: The Audi RS6 and the G-Power M5 Hurricane can dry your tears as well.

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic. Its special attraction is that you drive motorboat on the road. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it's ready to be used on the water as well. Thus careful maintenance and continuous checks are a must. If something leaks, the Amphicar will sink like a stone. Classic Ride meets Richard Orthuber who owns an Amphicar 770.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Season Review
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: MXGP of Switzerland, Frauenfeld
programme.desc: Lap after lap of international motorsports action. This is coverage from the FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) Motocross World Championship where riders from all over the globe compete in high-octane, fast-paced motocross racing. Competitors battle it out in races lasting 35 minutes plus 2 laps per race.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Israel, Jerusalem, Pais Arena
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Pamplona
programme.desc: FIM X-Trial World Championship is the most prestigious indoor motorcycle trials tournament of the world, organised by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme. The programme presents the highlights of the rounds where the participants have to take on the challenging tracks full of steep climbs and huge rocks.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The First Time) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The First Time»The Stunt Heroes from the Action Concept are shooting a car rollover. But stunt coordinator Carl wants to go the whole hog. His motto: if you're going to do something at all, you might as well do it properly! Thus, he throws an exciting shootout into the mix. He also has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants Uwe to sit in the passenger seat â?" for the very first time!

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: Around the world, the Mercedes S-Class is considered to be one of the most elegant and luxurious limousines. Now the S-Class treads new paths and presents itself topless for the very first time. It's large and heavy, but as an AMG Model also pretty damn quick and blessed with wonderful V8 sound. On the contrary, the Camaro coupe rather wants to be a bad boy than a classy cruiser. It's truly an exotic model, but also one of the cheapest coupes with a V8 engine.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.
